text: Pitfall! is an endless runner video game in the Pitfall! series. It was developed by British developer The Blast Furnace and published by Activision for iOS and Android in 2012. The game is no longer on the app store. ==Gameplay== Protagonist Pitfall Harry tries to escape an active volcano on foot and sometimes on a motorcycle or in a mine cart. There is no end to the game. ==Reception== The iOS version received "average" reviews according to the review aggregation website Metacritic. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2012 video games Category:Android (operating system) games Category:Endless runner games Category:IOS games Pitfall! Category:Single- player video games
title: Pitfall! (2012 video game)
